name: supernation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large or powerful nation, often consisting of several smaller nations: The development of a European super-nation is almost certainly impossible. They believe that the ultimate goal of the organization is the creation of a supernation.
More examplesFewer examplesWithout a European army, there is little prospect of a European supernation.A single market does not imply the existence of a single supernation.The alliance of states would need to transform into a super-nation.The first country to fully develop AI will become a global supernation.
